name: European Poultry, Egg and Game Association
goal: EPEGA is the European Poultry, Egg and Game Association. We are representing the interests of wholesalers and foreign trader of eggs, egg products, poultry meat and game meat in the EU. Traceability, food safety,animal welfare and quality controls are of major importance for the members of the association.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: WTO, International Trade, Common Agricultural Policy, Food and Feed Safety, Animal Health, Veterinary measures
